game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and retrieve the ancient artifact from the ruins.
game.description: You've heard rumors that the lost artifact is hidden within a forgotten ruin deep in the jungle. Your mission is to locate it and bring it back to the quest giver.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a legendary weapon blueprint

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the ruins
task.description: You must find the hidden entrance among the dense foliage. Talk to the local villagers for clues.
The ruins are filled with deadly traps and riddles. You'll need to solve them all to reach the artifact.
A powerful ancient guardian protects the artifact. You must defeat it to claim the artifact as your own.
